meanings.definition: Items that are intended to be discarded after use.
meanings.sent1: The throwaways were left on the table after the party.
meanings.sent2: I always make sure to recycle my throwaways.
meanings.sent3: The throwaways decided to have a party of their own in the trash can.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a pile of throwaways, easily tossed aside.
meanings.sent5: The pile of throwaways grew larger as the day went on.

meanings.definition: Things that are easily discarded or disposed of.
